algorithms.util

Class PolynomialFitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.util.PolynomialFitter

  • public class PolynomialFitter
extends java.lang.Object
    methods associated with fitting a 2nd order polynomial curve.
    Author:
    nichole

      • determineGoodEndPoints

        public static float[] determineGoodEndPoints(float[] coefficients,
                                             java.util.Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> points)
        determine good end points for the polynomial fit to the points. runtime complexity is O(N*lg_2(N)) + O(N)
        Parameters:
        coefficients -
        points -
        Returns:
        float[]{minX, YForMinX, maxX, YFoMaxX}

      • calcResiduals

        public static double calcResiduals(float[] coefficients,
                                   java.util.Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> points)
        calculate the square root of the sum of the squared differences between a 2nd order polygon defined by the given coefficients and the given points. Note that if coefficients or points are null or empty, it returns a result of infinity.
        Parameters:
        coefficients -
        points -
        Returns:

        calculate the square root of the sum of the squared differences between a 2nd order polygon defined by the given coefficients and the given points. Note that if coefficients or points are null or empty, it returns a result of infinity.

      • solveAfterRandomSampling

        public float[] solveAfterRandomSampling(java.util.Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> points)
        solve for 2nd order curve for a random sample of 1000 points from (dataX, dataY).
        Parameters:
        points -
        Returns:
        2nd order polynomial coefficients if solved, else null

      • solveAfterRandomSampling

        protected float[] solveAfterRandomSampling(java.util.Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> points,
                                           java.security.SecureRandom sr)
        solve for 2nd order curve for a random sample of 1000 points from (dataX, dataY).
        Parameters:
        points -
        sr - instance of secure random to use for generating random numbers
        Returns:
        2nd order polynomial coefficients if solved, else null. the coefficients are used in y = c0*1 + c1*x[i] + c2*x[i]*x[i]

      • solveOLS

        public float[] solveOLS(float[] dataX,
                        float[] dataY,
                        int polyDegree)
        solve for polynomial fit to curve x,y using coefficients up to order polyDegree. inclusive. Note that this method does not use regularization. This uses a Vandermonde matrix and QR decomposition.
        Parameters:
        dataX -
        dataY -
        polyDegree - polynomial degree to fit up to
        Returns:
        polyDegree order polynomial coefficients if solved, else null. The coefficients are used in y = c0*1 + c1*x[i] + c2*x[i]*x[i]

      • solve2ndOrderML

        public double[] solve2ndOrderML(double[] dataX,
